byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Prof C Rist and F Ashton-Gwatkin, French and Brit econ advisers, en route to U S to conf with French, Brit and U S officials on blockade functioning; Wash comment; Hull continues confs with Brit and French Ambs on U S notes
snippet: PARIS, March 1--Professor Charles Rist, former deputy governor of the Bank of France and at present economic counselor to the Blockade Ministry, and Frank Ashton-Gwatkin, technical adviser to the British Ministry for Economic Warfare, are en route...

headline.main: 2 ALLIED EXPERTS EN ROUTE TO U.S.; TO DISCUSS BLOCKADE

lead_paragraph: PARIS, March 1--Professor Charles Rist, former deputy governor of the Bank of France and at present economic counselor to the Blockade Ministry, and Frank Ashton-Gwatkin, technical adviser to the British Ministry for Economic Warfare, are en route to the United States on a special economic mission.
